name: "The Charming Lion"
description:
Maybe soon the best friend of your kid! 

A lovingly handmade cuddly lion.
The most truest companion for travelling and guardian trugh the night.
Soft and fluffy, with external stitches very sturdy ...

Washable at 40°C
around 27 cm long , 21 cm wide and about 6 cm high

Materials: 100 % cotton, fleece, satin ribbon on the tail, fabric paint


You will find different versions and other cuddly animals on my homepage:
www.Fiaba.de

name: Cuddly Crab - Baby rattle
description:
The Cuddly Crab

with a little bell inside and a wooden ring suitable for small hands and usefull as a teether 

around 18 x 20 cm tall,
material: fleece, wooden ring, high-quality cotton wool

Other baby-rattle-animals you´ll find at my homepage:
www.Fiaba.de

name: Baby Book "The Flower-Sheep" - a soft picture book
description:
A lovingly hand-painted and printed baby book
with 8 different designs

The first book for children - to learn the first words, colors, shapes ...
quite soft, with no rough edges, to cuddle and sleep.

A beautiful unique!

A nice present for childbirth or the first birthday!

Washable At 40 °C
60 cm long, when folded: 15 cm x 15 cm x 3 cm.
100% cotton, printed with fabric paints, volume flow, satin ribbon


For more Baby Books and other cute handmade things for children have a look at my homepage:
www.Fiaba.de

name: "The Big Dangling Fox"
description:
The super soft, orange fox swings with you through the
world and is always there - while playing, cuddling,
walking, going to sleep, relaxing and telling stories ...

A wonderful unique, elaborately sewed with attention to detail

washable at 40 ° C.
around 68 cm tall
material: soft fleece, 100% cotton and high quality polyfill

Have a look at my homepage: 
www.Fiaba.de 
- there you´ll find more lovely stuff for kids :)
